verses.verse: Judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H430>me<s%>, O God, and <S%H7378>plead<s%> my <S%H7379>cause<s%> against an <S%H3808>ungodly<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>: Oh <S%H6403>deliver<s%> me from the <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> and <S%H5766>unjust<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>.

For thou art the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H4581>strength<s%>; Why hast thou cast me <S%H2186>off<s%>? Why <S%H1980>go<s%> I <S%H6937>mourning<s%> because of the <S%H3906>oppression<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%>?

Oh send <S%H7971>out<s%> thy <S%H216>light<s%> and thy <S%H571>truth<s%>; Let them <S%H5148>lead<s%> <S%H935>me<s%>: Let them bring me unto thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill<s%>, And to thy <S%H4908>tabernacles<s%>.

Then will I <S%H935>go<s%> unto the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, Unto <S%H410>God<s%> my <S%H8057>exceeding<s%> <S%H1524>joy<s%>; And upon the <S%H3658>harp<s%> will I <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H430>thee<s%>, O God, my <S%H430>God<s%>.

Why art thou cast <S%H7817>down<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>? And why art thou <S%H1993>disquieted<s%> within <S%H3176>me<s%>? Hope thou in <S%H430>God<s%>; For I shall yet <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H3444>him<s%>, Who is the help of my <S%H6440>countenance<s%>, and my <S%H430>God<s%>.
